articles.author: Rachel Treisman
articles.title: An Australian woman is found guilty of murdering her in-laws by toxic mushrooms - NPR
articles.description: Erin Patterson hosted four of her estranged husband's relatives for lunch in July 2023. Three of them later died of death cap mushroom poisoning. Nearly two years later, a jury has found her guilty.
articles.content: After nearly two years and a nine-week trial, a jury has found Erin Patterson guilty in the murder and attempted murder of her estranged husband's elderly relatives, three of whom died after eating h… [+12013 chars]
